EditorModes

Class ObjectMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • EditorModes.EditMode
      • EditorModes.ObjectMode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddFinish, AddRotating, AddStart, AddStatic

    public abstract class ObjectMode
extends EditMode
    ObjectMode is an abstract class that extends EditMode and that is the parent of all Edit Mode that add MazeObjects to the maze.
    Author:
    Tom Hogervorst
